snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel is making a mistake by trying to browbeat President Obama into attacking Iran.
abstract: Editorial contends that Israeli Prim Min Benjamin Netanyahu's attempt to browbeat Pres Obama into a preemptive strike on Iran's nuclear program is both wrongheaded and dangerous; cites an Iran Project report that expounds on the astronomical costs that a full-scale intervention would involve.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel is making a mistake by trying to browbeat President Obama into attacking Iran.
